title: Backups
description: Below you will find the list of your backups. You can restore or fork any of them. These rolling backups are kept for your service to remain operational.
restoreBackupToastErrorTitle: An error occurred while restoring your service
restoreBackupToastSuccessDescription: Service restoration has been processed and will begin shortly.
errorSourceTypeFieldInvalid: This restore point type is not available for this service
errorSourcePITFieldInvalidDate: The date chosen is not valid
restoreModalDescription: Restoring a backup overwrites the information currently saved on your cluster. This operation may result in a loss of data.
inputSourceTypeDescription: Select the restore point from which the service will be restored.
